content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -82.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (41.0, -82.0)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (43.5, -80.5)) 
-  Chest (position (42.5, -83.5)) with 30 coal
-  Chest (position (44.5, -81.5)) with 30 coal
-  Chest (position (43.5, -79.5)) with 800 coal
-  Chest (position (45.5, -80.5)) empty

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Make sure the entity has enough fuel to extract items
-  Check the entity's warnings and status to identify any potential issues before extracting items
### Errors when mining
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue mining
-  Make sure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to mine
### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue inserting items
-  Make sure the inserter has enough space in the destination to insert items
